document_data.caption: A map showing the Gulf of Lath in western Lantan.
document_data.name: Gulf of Lath
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gulf of Lath''' was located on the western side of [[Lantan]] proper on the [[Trackless Sea]].
document_data.Geography: This narrow gulf cut into Lantan for roughly {{SI|75|mi|k|long=yes}}, running northeast into the island. The city of [[Lethtar]] was the only settlement found along its shores.
